otp.description: Enter the OTP you received in your mailbox.

reauth_confirm.description: The Volvo Cars integration needs to re-authenticate your account.
reauth_confirm.title: Credentials expired

data_description.friendly_name: This value is used in the entity ID (volvo_[friendly name]_[key]). If left empty, VIN will be used.
data_description.vin: The VIN is 17 characters long and probably starts with YV1 or YV4.

user.description: Enter your Volvo account credentials, VIN and Volvo developers API key (https://developer.volvocars.com/).

abort.no_options_available: No options available for your vehicle.

data_description.image_bg_color: Only applicable if transparent is not checked.

refresh_data.name: Refresh data
refresh_data.description: Refresh all data or only specific parts.

entry.name: Entry
entry.description: The entry to refresh. Leave empty to refresh the data for all entries.

data.name: Data
data.description: Leave the field empty to refresh all data.
